Guys, this works great. i use daemon tools to mount the game, than installed the crack files into the game directory. for those who cant get it to work and are having some errors, GOOGLE IT. when i have a problem with a game torrent that doesnt work, i dont blame the game. 90% of the time, a simple google search will solve the problem im having. don't automatically assume the torrent is not working, maybe its your damn pc. thats my 2 cents

Works great!

I'm using a 64 bit. The simple instructions to download worked.

Once downloaded, just burn or mount the iso file/image in a virtual disc reading software like Daemon Tools and install from there.

When installed, don't start the game. Copy the crack folder somewhere, maybe on your desktop so you can easily access it. Then open up the directory folder where the games content is installed. For me it was 
C:\Program Files(x86)\Focus Home Interactive\Cities XL 2011

Open the crack folder and copy and paste the .exe and .dll file in the directory. Don't drag and drop.

Then in the directory and the crack folder, double click the folder, Paks. Copy and paste the .pak file from the crack folder into the Paks folder in the directory. The game should work.

Thanks for the upload!

I got it working! SERIAL PROBLEM SOLVED!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Ok people with serial problem do the following:
1. Download this torrent
2. Mount/Open iso (with virtual clonedrive, daemon tools or whatever)
3. Install game
4. Go to google and type in "cities xl 2011 crack"
5. Download whichever one you want (internet explorer downloads faster than google chrome for me)
6. Open file with tugzip, winrar or whatever
7. Extract crack folder to desktop
8. Open folder, find the inner crack folder.
9. Copy this folder
10. Go to the shortcut for Cities XL 2011 on your desktop
11. Right click, then click on open file location
12. Paste it into here
13. Whenever it asks for a copy and replace, click yes, or "copy and replace"
14. RUN CITIES XL 2011!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I REALLY HOPE THIS HELPS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ENJOY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! (worked for me!)

Good torrent!

Or, for those with F'ing BRAINS ... Control+Click to highlight the files and RIGHT CLICK and drag (fucking morons!). You will get a mini popup menu that gives you the option to COPY, MOVE or CREATE A SHORTCUT. (Jesus Christ, I'm only a moderate Windows user and I knew that approach a decade ago.)

Note that the crack is in the folder called Crack on the ISO image.  That is, when you mount the image and go to the virtual DVD drive, you will see a folder called Crack.  enter that folder, and copy and paste all the contents into the same directory where CitiesXL_2011.exe is, making sure to tell it to replace all files.  No need to download a separate crack.
